Note: InMemoryLog keeps all logs in memory, so don't use it long running exceptions

member.name: T:ServiceStack.UrnId
member.summary:
Creates a Unified Resource Name (URN) with the following formats:
- urn:{TypeName}:{IdFieldValue} e.g. urn:UserSession:1 - urn:{TypeName}:{IdFieldName}:{IdFieldValue} e.g. urn:UserSession:UserId:1

member.name: P:ServiceStack.BundleOptions.Sources
member.summary: List of file and directory sources to include in this bundle, directory sources must end in `/`. Sources can include prefixes to specify which Virtual File System Source to use, options: 'content:' (ContentRoot HostContext.VirtualFiles), 'filesystem:' (WebRoot FileSystem), 'memory:' (WebRoot Memory)

member.summary: Whether to minify sources in bundle (default true)

member.name: P:ServiceStack.BundleOptions.SaveToDisk
member.summary: Whether to save to disk or Memory File System (default Memory)

member.name: P:ServiceStack.BundleOptions.Cache
member.summary: Whether to return cached bundle if exists (default true)
